title: Bilgewater Boarding Parties!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/jAmK0sD.jpg

Hey everyone,

If you're thinking about hosting some Boarding Parties head on over to our [Community Events portal](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/) and get it registered. Make sure you read both the [event faq](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/content/faq) and [Bilgewater faq](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/content/bilgewater-faq) before registering your event. 

You can also find some cool art to help promote your event [here!](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwYF_ARg_cwBflBoZjh3QXRUUzl2WnBSMV9OWG04SExyV1YtRjd3a2Mwa3hESmhtODVGbGc&usp=sharing)

replies.body: Someone hosting pls invite to event
You can also head on over to the community events portal and check out current events that are on and register!
